articles.title: Bill Gates: Microsoft founder to give most of $200bn fortune to Africa - BBC
articles.description: The Microsoft founder urges young innovators to use Artificial Intelligence to improve health services.
articles.content:
Microsoft founder Bill Gates says that most of his $200bn (£150bn) fortune will be spent on improving health and education services in Africa over the next 20 years. 
The 69-year-old said that "by u… [+3274 chars]
